fields.name: Error_Message_todisplay
fields.fieldText:
Please select for Category "Product Defect", Problem Type **Hardware or Software or Documentation

For Category "Not a Product Defect" Problem Type has to be "Change Request

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, but you cant read or update records at this time.

Please Contact System Admin


{!ErrorMessageFlow}

fields.name: RnDInterfaceErrorMessgae
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong please contact your Key User, or try again

fields.name: FinishScreen

For Updated Transfer Status see R&D Interaction - {!RnDName}

fields.name: ProblemInformationErrorScreen
fields.fieldText:

  • Subject - {!Problem.Subject}
  • Problem Description - {!Problem.CH_IssueDescription__c}

fields.name: ProblemAnalysisErrorScreen
fields.fieldText:
Transfer to R&D is not Possible as Analysis is not Completed

  • Steps to Reproduce Issue- {!Problem.Steps_to_Reproduce_Issue__c}
  • Summary of Analysis - {!Problem.CH_SummaryofAnalysis__c}
  • Validation of Root Cause - {!Problem.CH_ValidationofRootCause__c}
